oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Tinted postcard with photographic collage of Belgian soldiers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The postcard shows various depictions of Belgian soldiers during World War I. Soldiers are shown in fatigue dress doing manual labor, in winter dress standing guard duty, in typical undress uniform drinking and playing the accordian, and with helmets undergoing an inspection. The bottom center illustration shows a soldier under arrest and sitting on a bunk.
